title: Application of Lesson Study and Learning Study Models for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics education concepts and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, project-based assessment, and mathematics subject matter expertise development

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the core characteristics of Lesson Study and Learning Study models.
Learners apply a step-by-step process to implement learner-centered instructional design in mathematics classes.
Learners present verified lesson improvement strategies, developed through peer teacher collaboration, as project deliverables.
Learners design and implement effective teacher professional development activities in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
